errors.unexpectedDescription: An unexpected error occurred. Please reload the page.

share.title: Shared file
share.unsupported: Preview is not available for this file type.

errors.notFound: File not found or link expired.
errors.loadFailed: Failed to load the shared file.
errors.copyLink: Failed to copy link to clipboard.
errors.fileTooLargePreview: File is too large to preview ({{size}}). Please download the file to view it.

twoFactor.title: Two-factor authentication
twoFactor.caption: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app.
twoFactor.locked: Too many attempts. Please try again later.

forgotPassword.enterEmail: Please enter your email as the username to reset your password.
forgotPassword.sent: If an account with that email exists, a password reset link has been sent.
forgotPassword.error: Failed to send reset link. Please try again later.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.message: The page you are looking for does not exist.

profile.title: Profile
profile.subtitle: Your account information and security status.

shareLinks.title: Share links
shareLinks.description: Control how long generated share links stay valid.

totp.enabledDescription: Your account is protected with an additional security layer.

setup.title: Enable two-factor authentication (TOTP)
setup.caption: Use an authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Authy, etc.).

confirm.title: Confirm setup
confirm.caption: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app.

errors.setupNotInitiated: 2FA setup has not been initiated. Generate a QR code first.

emailVerification.title: Email verification
emailVerification.description: Verify your email address to enable password recovery and notifications.
emailVerification.sent: Verification email sent. Please check your inbox.
emailVerification.noEmail: No email address is set for your account.

errors.failed: Failed to send verification email. Please try again later.

sessions.title: Active Sessions
sessions.description: Manage your active sessions across different devices
sessions.revokeConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to end this session? This will sign out the device.

webdav.title: WebDAV Access
webdav.description: Generate a one-time token to connect via WebDAV.
webdav.confirmDescription: This will generate a new token and invalidate any previous one. The token will only be shown once.
webdav.tokenWarning: Copy this token now. It will not be shown again.
webdav.cardHelp: Use these values to connect with a WebDAV client. Generate a token to obtain a one-time password.

windows.title: Windows (Command Prompt)
windows.caption: Run in an elevated Command Prompt or use mapped drive in Explorer.

powershell.title: Windows (PowerShell escape)
powershell.caption: Use when running from PowerShell; the command is escaped for convenience.

linux.title: Linux (davfs2)
linux.caption: Use davfs2 or cadaver to mount the WebDAV endpoint.

setup.title: Server setup wizard
setup.subtitle: Complete the initial server configuration to get started. This won't take long and will personalize the app for you.

errors.saveFailed: Failed to save settings. Please try again.

setup.intro: You'll be asked simple questions about your Cotton Cloud usage preferences. If you're not sure, don't worry - many settings can be changed later.
setup.onlyAdminCanSetup: Only administrators can configure the application. Please ask an administrator to perform the initial setup.

questions.requiresTooltip: To enable this option, you need to select:

multiuser.title: You plan to use it:
multiuser.subtitle: This affects storage optimization and some security settings.
multiuser.linkAria: Open help in a new tab

descriptions.family: File deduplication, shared search index, and pre-installed modules.
descriptions.many: Stricter mode for security between unknown users.
descriptions.unknown: Will set the best optimal defaults.

usage.title: You plan to use the cloud for:
usage.subtitle: Select one or more options

descriptions.photos: Will install AI search and text recognition add-ons.
descriptions.documents: Optimization for office files and PDFs for home archive
descriptions.media: Optimization for video files and streaming, integration with movie database.
descriptions.other: General settings for mixed file types.

storage.title: Where do you want to store your data?
storage.subtitle: Choose storage location for your files. Cotton Cloud will use server disk for hot cache regardless of your choice.

descriptions.local: Store files on the server's local filesystem.
descriptions.s3: Store files in remote S3-compatible object storage.

email.title: Email configuration
email.subtitle: Choose where email notifications will be sent from.

descriptions.cloud: Public Cotton Cloud SMTP server will be used. It's secure and free. Choose this if you're not sure.
descriptions.custom: Configure your own SMTP server for sending email notifications.
descriptions.none: The simplest option, but you won't even be able to recover your password.

telemetry.title: Allow sending statistics?
telemetry.subtitle: This information helps us improve products and does not reveal your identity in any way. It's one of the few ways to support the project by providing automatic feedback. This helps us understand how Cotton Cloud performs on different systems and configurations, not just in an ideal test environment.

descriptions.allow: Send anonymous metrics that used for software feedback and bug fixes.

telemetry.disabledTooltip: To disable telemetry, you need to turn off the following services:

ai.title: AI and Computations
ai.subtitle: Choose where AI computations will be performed for search, recognition, and other features.

descriptions.local: Slow, most heavy features disabled and model quality is simplified. But the quality is still great - more than enough for any tasks.
descriptions.runner: Connect a separate GPU runner for computations. Fast, high quality - best models and support for all features.
descriptions.cloud: Optimal balance, but may have limitations. Incredible generosity for free. Requires internet connection.

timezone.title: Time Zone
timezone.subtitle: Select your time zone to avoid being disturbed by notifications and disk noise at night.

storageSpace.title: How much space are you giving to the app?
storageSpace.subtitle: This will help us optimize disk usage.

descriptions.all: Use all available space for maximum performance.
descriptions.economical: Aggressive space saving, compression and deduplication.
descriptions.unknown: It will choose optimal settings for you.

importSources.title: Anything to import?
importSources.subtitle: Select sources from which you want to migrate data.

nextcloudConfig.title: Nextcloud Import Setup
nextcloudConfig.subtitle: Enter credentials to connect to Nextcloud.

webdavConfig.title: WebDAV Import Setup
webdavConfig.subtitle: Enter credentials to connect to WebDAV server.

cloud.title: Your Personal Cloud
cloud.description: Store and sync your files securely across all your devices

storage.title: Unlimited Storage
storage.description: Never worry about running out of space with flexible storage options

security.title: Bank-Level Security
security.description: Your data is encrypted and protected with industry-leading security

speed.title: Lightning Fast
speed.description: Experience blazing-fast uploads and downloads with optimized performance

toasts.noneCopied: No files were uploaded (all were skipped).
toasts.someItemsSkipped_one: Skipped {{count}} item that could not be read.
toasts.someItemsSkipped_few: Skipped {{count}} items that could not be read.
toasts.someItemsSkipped_many: Skipped {{count}} items that could not be read.
toasts.someItemsSkipped_other: Skipped {{count}} items that could not be read.

errors.dropFailed: Failed to process dropped items. Please try again.

conflicts.title: File already exists
conflicts.description: A file with this name already exists in this folder. Upload as {{newName}}?

deleteFolder.confirmDescription: The folder will be moved to Trash and can be restored later.

deleteFile.confirmDescription: It will be moved to Trash and can be restored later.

errors.copy: Failed to copy link to clipboard.

errors.pdfTooLarge: PDF is too large to preview ({{size}}). Maximum size is {{maxSize}}. Please download the file to view it.
errors.fileTooLarge: File is too large to preview ({{size}}). Maximum size for text preview is {{maxSize}}. Please download the file to view it.

loading.title: Loading trash...
loading.caption: Please wait while we load the trash contents.

deleteFolderForever.confirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. All contents of the folder will be deleted.

emptyTrash.confirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. All items in trash will be permanently deleted.

resetPassword.title: Reset password
resetPassword.success: Password has been reset successfully. You can now sign in with your new password.

errors.invalidToken: The reset link is invalid or has expired.
errors.failed: Failed to reset password. Please try again.

verifyEmail.title: Email verification
verifyEmail.success: Your email has been verified successfully!

errors.invalidToken: The verification link is invalid or has expired.
errors.failed: Failed to verify email. Please try again.
